title: New issue of Design In-Flight now available
content:
Design In-Flight, a PDF magazine dedicated to web and graphic design professionals has just released their April 2005 issue, themed "Change".   
   
Type coverage provided by Hrant H. Papazian (!)   
   
+ Available for $3 from [http://designinflight.com/subscribe/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222445/http:/designinflight.com/subscribe/)   
   
+ For the complete table of contents, excerpts and a 4-page sample, visit [http://designinflight.com/issues/2005/apr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222445/http:/designinflight.com/issues/2005/apr/)   
   
+ About Design In-Flight ( [http://designinflight.com/about/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526222445/http:/designinflight.com/about/) )
author: arikawa : Tue, 2005-04-12 09:25
